post.body: Yeah and all the profane language is weird for a Wii game. Graphics hurts my head. Seem Dreamcast'ish.
I'm rockin' the Lea theme. It's good times on a stick. http://snipurl.com/9b76c
Dig through sections using Cydia.
Aww, it's better to leave it at that, bru. You don't wanna mess up a good thing.
Why so glum chum?
I beg to differ, bru. It's never too cold for no pants. Pants are overrated.
Well, No More Heroes is pretty gory. lol Very unexpected.
Woke up. 2009 isn't so exciting so far. :-/
At home hanging out. No Heather'ness tonight. Oh wells.
Well The Dark Knight special features are rubbish. There isn't anything on Ledger or The Joker. /sigh
Getting my oil changed in work van. la la la
You look nervous? Is it the scars? You wanna know how I got'em? Look at me... - I love this movie. http://snipurl.com/9b8qk
It's turning out to be a good day. Paid a day early. Joined Anytime Fitness, & may get to see Westbrook 2night while hanging w/ Clint & fam.
I figured out why I have no audio... This damn charger I have in it is killing text and sys sounds. Odd. lol
Well, my text sounds aren't working at all. That's swell. I may need to reload OS. JB on 3G is wonky compared to 2G. Wonder if phone is fkd.
Turned out to be pretty good day. Got two Gears 2 achievements today. Off tomorrow and new years day.
Seems to be a slow tweet day for everyone. I need to go to Orange. :-/
Oh the fat kid has tasty orange cake. Happy 26th birthday to me!! Yosh!! http://snipurl.com/98u4e
Kudos to the guy who created Leopard skin update for updating TXT icon, but boo for reusing IMG. http://snipurl.com/98pxn
I feel old.
